Literature.Title: Design, antimicrobial activity and mechanism of action of Arg-rich ultra-short cationic lipopeptides.
Literature.Author: Armas F, Pacor S, Ferrari E, Guida F, Pertinhez TA, Romani AA, Scocchi M, Benincasa M

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:<10% Hemolysis=50 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:60% Hemolysis=100 µg/ml,Human keratinocytes HaCat:0% Killing=100 µg/ml
